derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Tuxedo Park, the site of a country club in New York, where it was first worn

entry.tran: (男士在正式社交场合穿的)无尾礼服
entry.def: A tuxedo is a black or white jacket worn by men for formal social events.
